snippet.title: Everblade Demo Playthrough with Developer Commentary
snippet.description:
Join us as we play through the demo of our upcoming action platformer / metroidvania, Everblade. This action-packed and varied platformer adventure takes you through sprawling worlds full of different challenges, and of course, there's lots of treasure to be found.

We figured we should show you some of our own gameplay as we make it through the free demo available on our Steam page. Did you find everything seen in this video in your own playthrough? Can you uncover even more secrets?
Play the game and find out. 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1873570

Find us on social media:
https://twitter.com/elion_games
https://www.reddit.com/r/everblade_game
https://www.facebook.com/eliongames
https://www.instagram.com/elion_games/

(Upcoming Indie Game 2022, New Indie Game Release PC, Metroidvania 2022, Indie Gaming, New Action Platformer, Indie Platformer Game)

#metroidvania #newgames #indiegames
